title: For Sale: Tinker Portrait PSA 5 Piedmont 150, nicest 5 **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale: Tinker Portrait PSA 5 Piedmont 150, nicest 5 **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Extremely strong card, nicest 5 I've ever owned. I really don't know what I could be missing to account for the grade....$1250 delivered. **SOLD**

How much is it?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Also interested in a price.  This is one hell of a 5!
Looks like a good candidate for a PSA review (crack out/regrade)............

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1649715]Extremely strong card, nicest 5 I've ever owned. I really don't know what I could be missing to account for the grade....$1250 delivered[/QUOTE]


nice card

I have had a ton of inquiries on this card, thanks for all of them. Yes, the price is not quite in accordance with most 5's, but it's not ridiculous either based on the strengths of this card and what others have sold for. A fairly recent PSA 6 just sold for $1800 at Heritage Auctions that paled in comparison to this card in my opinion.  Sometimes you have to buy the card and not the holder, I've been guilty many times as I was on this one.  I looked at this card under a magnifying glass and found no wrinkles, a couple of members have asked about this. Your guess is as good as mine as to the grade. Thanks again for the inquiries, if it doesn't sell, I think I'm going to take Tim's advice and resubmit to PSA...

[quote name="Bigb13" post=1651819]-[/QUOTE]
